name: AP_CLAIM_IF_SVC_ACE_PMTST
description: This table contains the service line Ambulatory Code Editor (ACE) Procedure Payment Status value returned from the third party interface.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim info record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: SVC_ACE_PX_PMT_STAT
columns.description: The service line Procedure Payment Status field of the Ambulatory Code Editor (ACE) output fields for HCPCS procedures and claim line edits.
